reviewText: This Fons and Porter 600 series dvd is for more advanced quiters.  Demonstrates cutting and piecing curved pieces for your quilt.  YES, you have to have templates for this, and grandmother made hers.  Now you can by curved seam templates.  I have purchased my set of templates.  This block is somewhat challenging, but worth the time and effort. This dvd has many more quilting methods demonstrated.
